name: rsshub
description: RSSHub is a powerful self-hosted RSS generator that fetches content from virtually any site using custom scrapers. It offers modular routes and integrations for personalized feed tracking.

features.title: Universal Feed Generation
features.description: Create RSS feeds from thousands of websites using custom routes

features.title: Modular Architecture
features.description: Add new feed sources by writing simple route modules

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Generate feeds from Twitter, Instagram, Reddit, and other platforms

features.title: News Aggregation
features.description: Follow news sites, blogs, and publications without native RSS

features.title: Content Extraction
features.description: Parse and clean article content for distraction-free reading

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Track YouTube channels, podcasts, and video platforms

features.title: E
features.description: Follow product updates and price changes on shopping sites

features.title: Developer Tools
features.description: Track GitHub releases, commits, and issues via RSS
